amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to integrate the term "economic abuse" throughout the legislation, wherever "domestic violence" occurs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A037) offered by Ms. Porter.
